fields.name: Kingsley Vale
fields.media: Oil painting on stretched canvas - 83 x 74 cm. Framed in neutral grey moulding.
fields.description: The Yew trees of Kingsley Vale are such wonderful examples of unpruned or managed trees, allowed to follow their natural form. Painted in great detail with a highly coloured palette.

fields.name: Geometric Web
fields.description: I am very pleased to introduce my design: Geometric Web. The Geometric Web is a hand thrown spherical vase with the application of extremely detailed slip-trailing to create an undulating spiderâ€™s web.
